Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Research project on Learning by Doing in Vertical Channels joint with Professor Zaccour (HEC Montreal) and AProf Labrecciosa (Monash) co-funded by GERAD (Group for Research in Decision Analysis), Montreal, Canada. GERAD is a multi university research center involving approx. sixty experts from a mix of disciplines: quantitative methods for management, operations researchers, computer scientists, mathematicians and mathematical engineers.

Research project on Optimal Taxation of the Commons joint with Professor Benchekroun (McGill University) and AProf Labrecciosa (Monash) co-funded by CIREQ (Centre Interuniversitaire de Recherche en Economie Quantitative), Montreal, Canada.

Invited speaker at the Workshop on Mathematical Economics held at Keio University, Tokyo, Japan; research visit of one week (hosted by Professor Ozaki, Keio University) funded by The Japanese Society for Mathematical Economics, with the aim to foster international collaboration with foreign researchers.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Outside Studies Program, Deakin University, Melbourne, Australia (AUD 4.500)

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Graduate student supervision (Master and PhD): Pablo Esteban Jimenez, PhD student, Deakin University (completed); Sarah May Hilborn, Honours student, Deakin University (completed); Mark Hamilton, Honours student, Deakin University (completed); Andrew O’Connor, Honours student, Trinity College Dublin (completed)

Outstanding Reviewer for Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, awarded to top 10th percentile of reviewers for the Journal, in terms of the number of manuscript reviews completed.
